text: Tseo Allah a li hlolileng limeleng le makhomong, ba abela Allah karolo, e be ba re: “Tsena ke tsa Allah” – ho latela tumela-masaoana ea bona – “Ha tsena e le tsa batlatsetsi ba hae molemong oa rona”. Ke kamoo karolo eo ea batlatsetsi ba Hae ho bona e ke keng ea finyella ho Allah, karolo eo bae abelang Allah e finyella feela ho batlatsetsi ba bona. Ruri se fosahetseng ke molao oo oa bona
